Description: You enter your office, and sit down by your desk. You place the wand in front of you, looking wide-eyed at it. You have never felt the precence of such a powerful object before.

The broken piece hangs on by dark threads, perhaps pieces of hair. (i nästa kapitel, börja med detta beslut när du vet allt osince it was made by death, make a pact with death itself, or defeat the old master, Harry Potter)
